name: MiniWare - a WarioWare Inspired Game
description:
A game I made for my senior project at college

MiniWare is a game that is designed to be simple and fast (and also a time-waster!)

Play through a 10-round gauntlet of minigames. You have 3 HP, make sure to survive until the 10th to win!

There's also a Freeplay mode if you just want to play a certain game forever.

Have fun!

This is an early version of the game; bugs may be present.
